author: cms-sw
body: This change will allow to deploy gcc in  `externals/gcc/version` instead of `externals/gcc/SCRAM_GCC_VERSION`  e.g. instead of `externals/gcc/9.0.0` (where 900 is version from scram arch slc7_amd64_gcc900) now we will have compiler in `externals/gcc/9.2.1`
title: new compiler flag USE_COMPILER_VERSION to force use version from gcc.spec
